column4: Can someone please help me set the correct frequency for my monitor, i have the refresh rates for horizontal, vertical sync they are V-Synv:56-75 h-Sync:30-81, So how do i know whether my monitor can do 1440x900 (its native resolution) at 60 or 70 or 75 or 80 or 95hz?
VertRefresh is in Hz, HorizSync is in kHzz
yes please put the units there by yourself
i am looking for the single value as in 1440x900 @ 60hz or @ 75hz, the last digit is what i am interested in
modern monitor have protection again out of specfication values
how come you calulated the value of "75" that's what i am interested in
gtf allow to generate custom modelines
you didn't answer my question. HOw come you calculated that 75gz would be a safe valuye?
i mean given the vetical and horizontal sync rates is there a way one can manually calculate the sync rates that a monitor is capabl;e of doing
for 75Hz the hsync is 70.50kHz, that is a valid range for you minitor
vsync is refrest rate per seconds, it that case  75Hz
woudl you bet your life on the fact that i can set the resolution at 75hz and wont damage my monitor?, you see i am really nervous and would't want to damage my monitor by trusting just like that
i dont trush my life to a monitor that i don't know, maybe you just ask the manufacturer
unop pbureau thanks for all the help, i really appreciate it. Have a nice day!
